abstract: The agreement to acquire T-Mobile from Deutsche Telekom is a nice piece of complex engineering, the Deal Professor says.
snippet: The agreement to acquire T-Mobile from Deutsche Telekom is a nice piece of complex engineering, the Deal Professor says.
lead_paragraph: AT&T’s 78-page agreement to acquire T-Mobile USA from Deutsche Telekom shows how creative deal makers can become when the agreement is a sale of a private company, rather than the purchase of a public company. Here are the highlights from the filing:

headline.main: AT&T Deal Shows How Different a Private Sale Can Be
